section.name: DataAcquisition
section.definition: The hardware section describes the settings of the used hardware. There should be one hardware section for each hardware item that was used.

property.name: SerialNo
property.definition: The device's serial number.

property.name: InventoryNo
property.definition: The inventory number of the device.

property.name: Model
property.definition: The model name of this hardware item.

property.name: Manufacturer
property.definition: The Manufacturer of this hardware item.

property.name: Owner
property.definition: Who's the owner of the device.

property.name: AIResolution
property.definition: The voltage resolution of the analog input (AIN) subsystem given in bit.

property.name: AIMaxSampleRate
property.definition: The maximum sampling rate.

property.name: AIChannelCount
property.definition: The number of input channels of the DAQ-device.

property.name: AOResolution
property.definition: The voltage resolution of a data-acquisition analog output (AO) subsystem given in bit.

property.name: AOMaxSampleRate
property.definition: The maximum sampling rate.

property.name: AOChannelCount
property.definition: The number of output channels of the device.

property.name: DIOLineCount
property.definition: The number of digital input/output lines (DIO) of the device.

property.name: AIUsedChannelCount
property.definition: The number of used analog input channels.

property.name: AISampleRate
property.definition: The sample rate with which an individual input channel was sampled. Given in Hz.

property.name: AIChannelGain
property.definition: The gain of an input channel.

property.name: AIReference
property.definition: The reference to which voltages were measured. Usually either "common ground" or "differential".

property.name: AIPolarity
property.definition: The polarity of the measurement "unipolar" or "bipolar".

property.name: AOUsedChannelCount
property.definition: The number of used analog output channels.

property.name: AOSampleRate
property.definition: The sample rate with which an individual output channel was sampled. Given in Hz.

property.name: AOChannelGain
property.definition: The gain of an output channel.

property.name: Description
property.definition: A description of this hardware item.
